## ProteoBench

open and collaborative platform for community-curated benchmarks for proteomics data analysis pipelines.
![](https://fgcz-ms.uzh.ch/~cpanse/ProteoBenchChallenge/network.jpg)

::: footer
source: https://proteobench.readthedocs.io
:::

# How does it work?

## ProteoBench in 5 steps

![](https://fgcz-ms.uzh.ch/~cpanse/ProteoBenchChallenge/pipeline.jpg)

1. Choose a module (test case) to benchmark your proteomics data analysis workflow

2. Download the input data from the module page

3. Run your workflow on the input data

4. upload the results to ProteoBench

5. Compare your workflow run with validated benchmark runs


# Video Demo


## Expected impact {.smaller}

* Stimulate proteomics community for using benchmark  (16K)
* Increase C4L unity- all C4L prx groups are incorporated and will use the same data
* Increase transparency and reveal unexpected differences
* Improve quality of service
* Keep up with new data analysis tools (inspired by new new workflows in ProteoBench)
* Bridging EuBIC-MS and C4L efforts ensuring the core facility perspective
* Increase visibility, e.g., poster | paper | talk using c4l affiliation or web page
* contributing to ProteoBench community requesting supporting more modules ....
